column2: "Ana iyi kyerɛ dɛ yɛahyɛ ase bio riyi hɛnho ayɛw anaa? Anaa yehia nkamfo nwoma a yɛdze brɛ hom
column4: dɛ mbrɛ binom hia no a?"

column2: "Hom nye hɛn nwoma a wɔakyerɛw no wɔ hɛn akoma mu a nyimpa nyina hu na wɔkenkan;"
"na hom da edzi dɛ hom yɛ Kraest Jesus nwoma a ɔnam hɛn som do a wɔammfa dubir
column3: na mbom wɔdze Nyankopɔn tseasefo no Sunsum kyerɛwee
column5: na mbom nyimpa n'akomapon do a."

column2: "Na dɛm awerɛhyɛmu yi na yɛnam Kraest do enya no Nyankopɔn afamu;"

column3: dɛ yebu biribi dɛ ofi hɛnankasa hɛn mu; na mbom hɛn emudzi no fi Nyankopɔn;"

column2: "ɔno so na ɔama yetum yɛ ahyɛmu fofor no ho asomfo
column3: nnyɛ nkyerɛwee ho dze bi a
column4: na mbom sunsum dze a: na nkyerɛwee dze ɔma owu

column2: "Na sɛ owu som a wɔkyerɛwee krukyee no wɔ abo do no nyaa enyimnyam
column3: ma Israelmba enntum anngyen enyi annhwɛ Moses enyim wɔ n'enyim enyimnyam a orutwa mu ntsi a

column2: "ɔbɛyɛ dɛn koraa na sunsum som no rinnya enyimnyam?"
"Na sɛ afɔbu som no yɛ enyimnyam a
column3: mpɛn ahen na tsenenee som no mbom bor do pii wɔ enyimnyam mu?"

column2: "Mpo dza wɔahyɛ no enyimnyam no nnyi enyimnyam wɔ iyi afamu
column3: osian enyimnyam no a ɔkyɛn no ntsi."

column2: "Na sɛ dza otwa mu no mpo nam enyimnyam mu a
column3: nna dza otsim hɔ no dze ɔwɔ enyimnyam pii."

column5: "na yɛnnyɛ dɛ Moses a ɔdze nkataenyim kataa n'enyim ma Israelmba eenntum anngyen hɔn enyi annhwɛ enyimnyam a orutwa mu no n'ewiei:"

column4: ɔdze bodu ndɛ nkataenyim kor no ara da ho wɔ ahyɛmu dadaw no ne kenkan do a wonnya nnyii

column2: "Na ɔdze bodu ndɛ yi ara mpo
column3: sɛ aber biara wɔkenkan Moses nwoma no a
column4: nkataenyim da ho wɔ hɔn akoma do."

column2: "Na sɛ aber biara wɔdan ba Ewuradze nkyɛn a

column3: na mbrɛ Ewuradze Sunsum wɔ na fahodzi wɔ."
yɛdze enyim a wɔnnkataa do rekyerɛ Ewuradze enyimnyam no dɛ yɛrohwɛ ahwehwɛ mu
column4: wɔsakyer hɛn kɔ subea kor no ara bi mu
column5: fi enyimnyam mu kɔ enyimnyam mu
column6: na iyi fi Ewuradze no sunsum no ara."
